name: !_ast Monster
description:
CONTROLS:

  • arrow keys left and right = move
  • Z = jump
  • X = attack
  • Esc = open menu

You can also perform a wall-grab by holding toward the direction of the wall when jumping.

==========

Story:

It is the year 10X6 and all but 1 monster has been vanquished from the kingdom of Coronereria. 

You are Ser Binglebor, the greatest hero in the land. 

It has come to your attention that the last monster has barricaded itself in the king's throne room.

Now you must venture through dangerous biomes and defeat ... 

1... last... MONSTER!

==========

_1ast_Monster is a very short (micro -game) 1-bit 2D narrative platformer.

It is inspired in part by Ludum Dare themes, and very weird dreams.

Try to see if you can find all endings. :)
